info.name: Youtube Music Desktop Redesign
info.description: A complete redesign of the YTM Desktop. Keep in mind the CSS is written very poorly and there are things still missing that I don't use often personally.
info.additionalInfo:
0.4:
- Fixed background behind now playing to fit new album cover height
- Fixed progress bar to better respond to mouse presses (bigger hit map)
- Made secondaryProgress invisible and used the correct div for background-color
- Removed every unnecessary margin and padding alteration on the now playing bar

0.3:
- Changed iTunes style Now Playing to a bigger, more modern bar.

0.2:
- Fixed playlist color
- Fixed box-shadow inset being way too agressive
- Fixed list colours and padding
